Ponsonby CEO in court over alleged road rage attack on North Shore pensioner, pleads not guilty, granted suppression https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-ceo-in-court-over-alleged-road-rage-attack-on-north-shore-pensioner-pleads-not-guilty-granted-suppression/ KE65GSE2NZHEPFCDV4KAQH3QGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-ceo-in-court-over-alleged-road-rage-attack-on-north-shore-pensioner-pleads-not-guilty-granted-suppression/ KE65GSE2NZHEPFCDV4KAQH3QGI/ Lane NicholsThe man's lawyer claimed publication of his name could cause financial harm to his company Tue, 24 Sep 2024 03:29:37 +0000 A Ponsonby CEO has appeared in North Shore District Court in connection with an alleged road rage incident involving a pensioner. The 36-year-old pleaded not guilty to fighting in a public place and dangerous driving, and was granted interim name suppression. Photo / NZME
